name: Album_Be Part Of It!
description:
Album: Be Part Of It
Tracks: 9 Tracks
Release Date: 11th May 2009 
Presale Release: 1st May 2009 

Full Track listing:

1. The True Believers
2. We all Cant Be superheros (Album Version)
3. If you Got! I Got! We Got!
4. Somewhere We Go.
5. Best Days Of Your Life (Album Version)
6. Behind The Rush (Album Version)
7. p.s.with friends making atmostpheres (Album Version)
8. Good Luck (Album Version)
9. Young Before The Evening 

ORDER INFORMATION:
All copies ordered as part of the pre-sale will be sent out on May 11th 2009. Please allow a few days delivery. ALL ORDERS WILL BE DISPACHED WITHIN 24 HOURS OF ORDERING.

GENERAL ENQUIRIES:
comicboybooking@yahoo.co.uk

IMPORTANT INFO:

Due to a really good summer, and some great fans, I have sold out of hard copies of my album. There are two free downloads on www.myspace.com/comicboyuk in the meanwhile, for those who wish to download some tracks. 'These are young before the evening' and 'good luck'. I will be releasing my new EP "Love and assemble" in the new year, which will only be available on Itunes. 

You will be able to download the "be part of it" album on Itunes soon. Please check myspace for updates on the Itunes release for the album "be part of it" and my new EP itunes release "Love andf assemble".
